text: This puzzled such students of comparative religion as had failed to detect this cult. But Mr. Healey had a partial and limited success. He rallied behind him the Left-wing opinion so coolly snubbed last night by his leader, Mr. Gaitskell. Mr. Godber's performance merited all the mild scorn heaped on it by Mr. Shinwell.
handwritten_text: This puzzled such students of comparative religion as had failed to detect this cult. But Mr. Healey had a partial and limited success. He rallied behind him the Left-wing opinion so coolly snubbed last night by his leader, Mr. Gaitskell. Mr. Godber's performance merited all the mild scorn heaped on it by Mr. Shinwell.
